tools.name: gotestfmt
tools.description: Go test output formatter for human readble test outpus.

tools.name: goverter
tools.description: goverter is a tool for creating type-safe converters. All you have to do is create an interface and execute goverter.

tools.name: Tokenex
tools.description: Tokenex provides a unified interface for obtaining and refreshing credentials from various cloud providers and authentication systems. It is designed to facilitate secure access to cloud resources by exchanging identity tokens for temporary credentials.

tools.name: Goose
tools.description: Goose is a database migration tool. Both a CLI and a library.

tools.name: Passkit
tools.description: A go library for generating Apple Wallet PKPasses.

tools.name: Loongsuite
tools.description: Loongsuite Go Agent provides an automatic solution for Golang applications that want to leverage OpenTelemetry to enable effective observability. No code changes are required in the target application, the instrumentation is done at compile time.

tools.name: OpenTelemetry Go Compile Instrumentation
tools.description: A tool to automatically instrument Go applications with OpenTelemetry at compile-time. It modifies the Go build process to inject OpenTelemetry code into the application without requiring manual changes to the source code.

tools.name: valkey-go
tools.description: A fast Golang Valkey client that does auto pipelining and supports server-assisted client-side caching.

tools.name: apitest
tools.description: A simple and extensible behavioural testing library for Go. You can use api test to simplify REST API, HTTP handler and e2e tests.

tools.name: validator
tools.description: Package validator implements value validations for structs and individual fields based on tags.

tools.name: miniredis
tools.description: Pure Go Redis test server, used in Go unittests.

tools.name: httpin
tools.description: httpin helps you easily decode data from an HTTP request (query params, bodies etc.) from struct tags.

tools.name: controller-idioms
tools.description: controller-idioms is a collection of generic libraries that complement and extend fundamental Kubernetes libraries (e.g. controller-runtime) to implement best practices for Kubernetes controllers.

tools.name: filepath-securejoin
tools.description: An implementation of `SecureJoin` to make path resolution within a potentially-untrusted directory safe on GNU/Linux.

tools.name: jsonschema
tools.description: A powerful Go JSON Schema validator library aligned with the JSON Schema Draft 2020-12. It features enhanced validation outputs and supports internationalization.

tools.name: sigs.k8s.io/yaml
tools.description: A wrapper around go-yaml designed to enable a better way of handling YAML when marshaling to and from structs.
